column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Bread options were more limiting and certainly pricier than I would have liked
column2: but the ones that were on the docket erred on the side of hearty and savory
column3: even the sweet options. My scone had a biscuit-like mild saltiness and a tinge of sweetness. Lastly
column4: coffee does get taken up a notch here
column5: at least compared to many other bakeries.
